author: chabotc
msg: When applying ghelmling@gmail.com's sugested change from the orignal patch
// Straight into the Feed object - override usual resp structure
We missed changing the gadgets.json.parse bit, which broke the feed support.
After this change it's working correctly again for the php part, and i fully
expect the java side's feed support patch requires this change too to function.

author: jbohn
msg: update 2.0.2 repository to reference the released versions of the plugins rather than the SNAPSHOTS

author: doll
msg: Patch from Vincent Siveton. Adds a script to generate a committers file from the java pom.xml. Cleans up the pom.xml to have the right people noted and checks in the first generated file.
